segments.text: Looking at this scene, I see the woman at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate intently, not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the faucet is filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing and running down onto the floor in a sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste, and she's just standing there in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window is so tidy, a nice escape.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are at the cabinet, up to some fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on the stool, reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like the stool might tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, maybe to steady himself or catch cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl has her arm raised, hoping for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's naughty, but I remember doing that as a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup feels tense with all these hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a simple scene, yet full of little disasters waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR
